name: tm52
effect: Teaches Focus Blast to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Focus Blast to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.
